# microsoft-docs-mcp (stub)

Status: scaffold only. Intended to search Microsoft Learn/Docs for best practices.

Quickstart:

```bash
python -m microsoft_docs_mcp ping
python -m microsoft_docs_mcp search bicep

# MCP stdio JSON-RPC mode (Content-Length framing)
python -m microsoft_docs_mcp mcp
```
